name: Jack And The Skeletons
description:
The fearless archaeologist Jack is on his new expedition and along with it, a mission: Find lost treasures in mysterious caves where no normal human being would dare enter.

Prepared for any surprises, except rats which he hates and is terrified of, Jack is faced with warrior skeletons that start chasing and attacking him and all Jack has is his gun and some dynamite in his backpack.

Jack's only way out is to find the treasure chests while fighting underworld creatures, bats, snakes and the dreaded rats.

Will the fearless archaeologist find his treasures?

How long will he withstand the attacks of his enemies?

Embark on this adventure and find out what will become of Jack at the end of his mission!

30 Levels
World Records
Many enemies... and rats!
